name: Tile Heroes
description:
An isometric RPG where you create the adventure by placing down the path tile by tile. Find party members, fight monsters, and acquire items to become strong enough to fight the boss monster at the end of the quest.

Created for Game Studio Capstone at Fitchburg State University

  • Chistopher Cornford - Engineer
  • Brockton DiSalle - Artist, Animator, Systems Designer
  • Zachary Jesionowski - Artist, Animator, Producer
  • Aurom Lum - Systems Designer
  • Philip Quan - Music
  • Kenneth Howell - Graphic Design
  • Britt Snyder & Jeff Warmouth - Faculty Mentors
